org.sql: SELECT users.* FROM users WHERE users.status = "$1" AND users.type IN ("$2", "$3") AND (LOWER(users.login) LIKE LOWER('%rober%') OR users.id IN (SELECT user_id FROM email_addresses WHERE LOWER(address) LIKE LOWER('%rober%')) OR LOWER(users.firstname) LIKE LOWER('%rober%') OR LOWER(users.lastname) LIKE LOWER('%rober%')) ORDER BY users.type DESC, users.firstname, users.lastname, users.id LIMIT "$4"

rewrites.sql: SELECT users.* FROM users WHERE users.status = "$1" AND users.type IN ("$2", "$3") AND (LOWER(users.login) LIKE LOWER('%rober%') OR users.id IN (SELECT user_id FROM email_addresses WHERE LOWER(address) LIKE LOWER('%rober%') LIMIT 1) OR LOWER(users.firstname) LIKE LOWER('%rober%') OR LOWER(users.lastname) LIKE LOWER('%rober%')) ORDER BY users.type DESC, users.firstname, users.lastname, users.id LIMIT "$4"
